com.tymeac.jini.base

Class JiniActivationCreate2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tymeac.jini.base.JiniActivationCreate2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JiniFrontEndShutDown, java.rmi.Remote

    public class JiniActivationCreate2
extends java.lang.Object
implements JiniFrontEndShutDown
    Continue building the activation and set up the two Jini services. This process remains alive until shut down by a Tymeac Server shut down or manually with a com.tymeac.jini.JiniActivationDistroy or by an o/s kill.
